Events that occurred on 6 May

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1944 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 66.
1961 - Actor Wally Wingert is born.
1963 - J.R.R. Tolkien finishes writing a letter to Mr. and Mrs. Kloos.
1966 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Martin Snapp.
1968 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 303.
